This page lists the various '''official ''[[Minecraft (franchise)|Minecraft]]'' merchandise release''' by or in collaboration with [[Mojang Studios]].
{{-}}
== Official ''Minecraft'' Shop ==
{{distinguish|Minecraft store|Marketplace}}
[[File:Minecraft Smartwatch.webp|thumb|A {{MC}} smartwatch, which can be found on the Official ''Minecraft'' Shop.]]
The [https://minecraftshop.com Official ''Minecraft'' Shop] features various clothing, plush toys, and other accessories themed around ''Minecraft''.
{{-}}
== LEGO ==
[[File:LEGO Micro World.png|thumb|200px|One of the various LEGO ''Minecraft'' sets.]]
{{main|LEGO Minecraft}}

In December 2011, Mojang Studios submitted the concept of ''Minecraft'' merchandise to {{w|LEGO}} for the LEGO Ideas (then known as LEGO Cuusoo) program, from which it quickly received 10,000 votes by users, prompting LEGO to review the concept. On January 24, 2012, LEGO Ideas announced the concept was approved and they would develop sets based around ''Minecraft''. In February 2012, the first [[LEGO Minecraft|LEGO ''Minecraft'']] set of ''Micro World'' was showcased and made available for pre-order, with a release set for mid-2012. Since then, various LEGO ''Minecraft'' sets have gradually released continuously.
{{-}}
== Books ==
[[File:Updated Essential Handbook.png|thumb|The essential handbook, one of many pieces of merchandise released for ''[[Minecraft]]''.]]
''[[Minecraft Books|The Official Minecraft Books]]'' are a series of guidebooks for ''Minecraft'', written for new and inexperienced players.
{{-}}
==''Minecraft'': Creeper Crunch==
[[File:MCCreeperCrunch.png|thumb|The ''Minecraft'': Creeper Crunch cereal.]]
[[Minecraft: Creeper Crunch]] is a {{w|breakfast cereal}} that is produced by {{w|Kellogg's}} in the United States, consisting of pulverized oats flavored with {{w|cinnamon}} and "Creeper Bit" {{w|marshmallows}} melded into cubes.
{{-}}

== Action figures ==
[[File:Steve Coal Figure.jpeg|thumb|150px|Steve action figure.]]
{{main|Action figures}}

{{w|Mattel}} manufactured a series of ''Minecraft'' action figures.
{{-}}
== Hot Wheels ==
{{main|Minecraft Hot Wheels}}
[[File:DXT22 Creeper.webp|thumb|Creeper car.]]
From 2017 to 2022, the toy brand Hot Wheels released a special line of cars based on ''[[Minecraft]]'' mobs as part of their [https://hotwheels.fandom.com/wiki/Character_Cars Character Cars] series.
{{-}}

== Higround ==
[[File:Higround Keyboards.jpg|thumb|''Minecraft'' x Higround keyboards.]]
{{main|Higround}}

On May 29, 2024, as part of the [[15th anniversary]] event, various keyboards and other accessories were released in collaboration with Higround.
{{-}}
== Youtooz ==
{{main|Youtooz}}
[[File:Youtooz Ender Dragon.jpg|thumb|Ender Dragon vinyl figure.]]
Two series of vinyl figures based on ''Minecraft'' mobs were manufactured and released by Youtooz.
{{-}}

== The Woobles ==
{{main|The Woobles}}
[[File:The Woobles Minecraft Iron Sword Kit.jpg|thumb|Iron Sword crochet kit.]]
Six crochet kits and four bundles based on ''Minecraft'' mobs were released by The Woobles on June 5, 2024.
{{-}}
